NAME

index_create - create a JPIP (JPEG 2000 Part 9) indexed JP2 file from a J2K file

SYNOPSIS

index_create source destination indexversion

DESCRIPTION

	index_create creates a JPIP-indexed JP2 file from a J2K file

OPTIONS

source        J2K file to index

destination   J2P file to write the indexed file to

indexversion  Index version to use:

              0. [faix] 4-byte and no AUX fields
              1. [faix] 8-byte and no AUX fields
              2. [faix] 4-byte and AUX fields
              3. [faix] 8-byte and AUX fields

AUTHOR

Written by Paul Hampson <Paul.Hampson@Pobox.com> based on the output of index_create as part of the Debian packaging of OpenJPEG

COPYRIGHT

Copyright 2007 Paul Hampson

SEE ALSO
